title: 'Dumb and Dumber, I'd call them': Roy Keane lays into Tottenham pair Serge Aurier and Danny Rose
text:
Roy Keane slammed the performances of Tottenham's full backs Serge Aurier and Danny Rose against Liverpool, labelling the pair 'Dumb and Dumber' after Sunday evening's clash.

The pair endured a tough time at Anfield, with Rose struggling against his opposite number Trent Alexander-Arnold, while his team-mate on the opposite flank was at fault for conceding the penalty that led to the Reds' victory.

Talking in the Sky Sports studio after the game, Keane said: 'The two Tottenham full-backs were dreadful. Dumb and Dumber, I'd call them.

Roy Keane blasted the displays of Tottenham full backs Danny Rose (L) and Serge Aurier (R)

'I thought they were really poor. You can't compare them to Liverpool, the two lads who are absolutely fantastic.

'Particularly going forward, okay defensively there's parts of the games they can improve on, but going forward they're absolutely fantastic.'
description: The pair endured a tough time at Anfield, with Rose struggling against his opposite number Trent Alexander-Arnold, while his team-mate on the opposite flank was at fault for conceding a penalty.
